message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you this incredible product. I think it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. As we start our negotiation, I'm willing to offer you the product for $750000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your initial offer, Alice. However, I was hoping we could meet in the middle. I'm willing to pay $725000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, and I'm willing to meet you halfway. However, I'm still looking to get a better price for the product. I'm willing to offer you the product for $735000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the product's value to you.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $720000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand your desire to save some money, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go below $730000. I'm willing to make one more concession, and I'll offer you the product for $730000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept for this incredible product.

I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $725000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
